web_snippets: Rob Hart (born 1982 - New York, USA) is an American author, novelist and former journalist. He is best known for his work The Warehouse and the Ash McKenna ...
Rob Hart is the author of the USA TODAY bestseller Assassins Anonymous, as well as The Paradox Hotel, a finalist for the Lambda Literary Award.
